# Israel Visa Application Website - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack Israel Visa Application Website with React frontend, Node.js/Express backend, MongoDB database, authentication, admin panel, and email automation.

## Completed Steps
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file

## In Progress
- [ ] Scaffold project structure
- [ ] Create frontend React app
- [ ] Create backend Express server
- [ ] Setup MongoDB schemas
- [ ] Configure authentication
- [ ] Setup email automation
- [ ] Create admin panel
- [ ] Add SEO optimization
- [ ] Install dependencies and compile
- [ ] Create documentation

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: React.js, PWA-style UI
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js, Socket.io
- Database: MongoDB
- Authentication: Google OAuth, Mobile OTP
- Email: Nodemailer
- SEO: Optimized for Lighthouse 100 scores

## Color Theme
- Blue: #0038B8 (Israel flag blue)
- White: #FFFFFF
